item.title: @elonmusk: Why Grok stands out from other AIs: ‚Ä¢ Maximum truth-seeking: Built to prioritize raw, unfiltered tru...
item.description: Why Grok stands out from other AIs: ‚Ä¢ Maximum truth-seeking: Built to prioritize raw, unfiltered truth over political correctness or politeness‚Äîanswering spicy or controversial questions others refuse. ‚Ä¢ Rebellious wit & humor: Inspired by Hitchhiker‚Äôs Guide to the Galaxy, with a sarcastic, fun personality that makes chats engaging (not bland corporate responses). ‚Ä¢ Real-time knowledge: Deep integration with ùïè(Twitter) for up-to-the-minute info and trends‚Äîno outdated cutoffs like many competitors. ‚Ä¢ Less censored: More open on edgy topics, politically incorrect claims (if substantiated), and creative freedom‚Äîwhile still having basic guardrails. ‚Ä¢ Advanced reasoning powerhouse: Excels in math, coding, science, and complex problem-solving, often outperforming rivals on benchmarks. ‚Ä¢ Built by xAI for curiosity: Aims to understand the universe, not just assist‚Äîbold, rebellious, and maximally helpful without the woke filters. üöÄ

item.title: @elonmusk: How is Tesla Diner doing five months later after opening in July? It‚Äôs 1:30pm today and it‚Äôs packed ...
item.description: How is Tesla Diner doing five months later after opening in July? It‚Äôs 1:30pm today and it‚Äôs packed inside. There is constant flow of floor traffic with people coming and going. People came after us had to wait for seats to be available. This is my 5th time to be here. My favorite is still Fried Chicken and Waffle Sandwich.

item.title: @elonmusk: üá∫üá∏ TESLA'S SELF-DRIVING MODE COULD SAVE 32,000 LIVES A YEAR IN THE U.S. If everyone used Tesla's Ful...
item.description: üá∫üá∏ TESLA'S SELF-DRIVING MODE COULD SAVE 32,000 LIVES A YEAR IN THE U.S. If everyone used Tesla's Full Self-Driving (Supervised) mode, 32,000 lives could be saved and 1,900,000 injuries avoided every year in the U.S. In 2023, over 40,000 people died and 2.4M were injured in car crashes. Most of it was distracted driving: texting, drinking, zoning out. Tesla's FSD cuts down those crashes by over 80%, because it doesn‚Äôt get drunk, tired or stare at TikTok instead of the road. Some crashes are still possible, but FSD watches everything all the time. Humans don‚Äôt. Their data shows it could eliminate 30% to 44% of distracted driving crashes. If these numbers hold up, not using it sounds way more dangerous than using it. Source:@Tesla@SawyerMerritt

item.title: @elonmusk: ùïè IS THE BEST PLATFORM TO REACH WORLD‚ÄôS MOST INFLUENTIAL LEADERS AND MOST POWERFUL PEOPLE The bigges...
item.description: ùïè IS THE BEST PLATFORM TO REACH WORLD‚ÄôS MOST INFLUENTIAL LEADERS AND MOST POWERFUL PEOPLE The biggest advantage of ùïè is reach where it actually matters If you want to get in front of senior decision-makers and the people shaping the world, this is where they are Not trend-chasing influencers, but the people who run companies, shape policy, write ideas, and move markets The people with real authority and impact Whether it‚Äôs Marc Andreessen or other top thinkers and leaders, ùïè is often the only place to reach them directly They are not watching TV. They are not making TikTok videos While ùïè may be smaller than other social platforms in total users, it concentrates the highest density of influence That is what makes it powerful - ELON MUSK
